website_summaries.verdict: Enhanced with nourishing natural oils, this beard wash and conditioner duo offers excellent value for the money. Attractive packaging makes this a great gifting option.
pros: Contains a generous variety of beard-friendly essential oils
Wash lathers well and leaves facial hair feeling fluffy, clean, and refreshed
Conditioner softens, smooths, and replenishes moisture
Mint delivers a soothing, cooling effect
Great price for a cleansing and conditioning set
cons: Not everyone is a fan of the minty aroma

customer_reviews.title: New bottles don't work
customer_reviews.text: I have been a long time user and fan of this shampoo and conditioner as well as the beard oil. I was running low so I bought more, new bottles came in and they have changed. I can barely squeeze the bottle, nothing comes out. I tried to empty some of the product, same thing. I emailed company they said they've received similar complaints on new bottles and they won't have newerr bottles until December or January. Guys, if you know there's a quality issue, stop selling. These bottles are just difficult to use they are impossible. They literally don't squeeze. I'm not sure how something so obvious slipped by your quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: The product itself is mediocre.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is mediocre. Husband didn't feel it was anything special. "It's minty, so it feels nice on your skin - cooling. But other than that, it's nothing special. The conditioner is better than the wash because it's more minty. There is nothing outstanding about it." As his wife, I don't smell anything, and the husbands beard actually feels stiffer. ~~Husbands main complaint is that the product is in very heavy plastic *squeeze* bottles, which makes it hard to get the product out. "You have to unscrew the caps to get the product out. It's very irritating to have to do that and it then it gets all over." As far as cost, the husband says it's overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: The Frassy Family

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff for a manly beard!
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way! Suds up fast and furious and wages my beard clean. The conditioner leaves it smoother than before I discovered it! Both have a nice, minty smell that is pleasant and aromatic, and doesn't leave you smelling like a Grateful Dead concert.. Pair out with Honest Amish Beard Balm and you've got a winning triumvirate! If these guys had a cheap effective beard balm and a decent comb, they'd corner the whole beard-care market! Get on it guys! A manly beard takes care and grooming. There's a fine line between manly and nasty... Trust Viking Revolution to keep you on the right side of that line!
customer_reviews.author: Dogtired

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling set that leaves your beard soft and your chin soothed!
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo and conditioner came in a very nice looking package/box, with a sticker (the logo of the company), a discount card for next purchase, and the two bottles. I washed my beard the same day in the evening, to try it out. Both the shampoo and the conditioner were of nice consistency and had a pleasant aroma, but what truly impressed is how soft the beard hair felt after... Superb! I will be checking out the company's other products.
customer_reviews.author: Shōjikina Otōsan

customer_reviews.title: oil and butter work perfect on my thick hair
customer_reviews.text: A combination of the Viking Revolution beard wash, oil and butter work perfect on my thick hair. It is easy to brush and remains soft.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: Did I say it smelled good? It smells like a peppermint or something got stuck in my beard. Clears your nose out from the smell. It's not a really heavy scent. It's nice and fresh smelling. Stays that way for hours. My beard is nice and soft, but that may be from the upkeep on my end. It's my first time using this product. Did I say it smells good? My wife loves it, my beard doesn't smell like a used ashtray like from other products (that's what she said). You don't smell girly either. I'll keep using it. I have the peppermint one now, I'll try some sandalwood next.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lydy

customer_reviews.title: MAKES HAIR FALL OUT. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: The product has an aroma that will burn your eyes. Also, the bottles are too structurally hard that you have to take the top off just to get product out since it’s nearly impossible to squeeze. EDITED REVIEW : After 3 weeks of using this product, my beard hair is coming out every few seconds it seems and it is thinning out very badly. I now have completely uneven beard hair and will have to shave my beard and restart after 9 months of growth
customer_reviews.author: Dalton Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Best beard grooming starter with best value for cash.
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the kit, this merchandise really is helping to to groom my beard in a much better way. I like the texture, and the way it looks and my beard smells nice too. Really loved the product, would recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: parth

customer_reviews.title: By far the best, i don't mess with the rest!
customer_reviews.text: I admit it, i am a solid fan of All your amazing Viking Revolution product lines! Im one with a full beard, and totally trust my Viking Beard Wash to keep my beard both Healthy and clean👍🏼. Likewise, I faithfully Use My Viking Beard Conditioner knowing That it is the best for care and conditioning. Without failure, my best friend and long time wife assures me of the softness and great Scent of wash and conditioner, and that folks means a LOT💋👍🏼!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I always thought beard washes and conditioners were just a way for companies to make money but I decided to give it a go. The shampoo works great I can feel the difference in the way it feels compared to a generic shampoo or body wash. The conditioner is on a whole bother level! I couldn’t believe how soft my beard was after. Now I haven’t purchased any other beard conditioners or shampoos so can’t compare but this stuff worked great. Still debating on trying their other products such as the balm but I am a big fan of another brand
customer_reviews.author: David Donabedian

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Been having a problem with flakey skin under my beard for about 6 months. Have tried a better shampoo and Dandruff shampoo, all to no avail. Finally started looking at Beard shampoo/conditioners and found a reference to the Viking Revolution stuff. Ordered the small size to try it ou. It has worked grreat. No more beard itch or flakey skin. Love the tingle the Beard Rinse leaves. The smell is just right. Left my bear soft and silky. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Henry

customer_reviews.title: terrible
customer_reviews.text: I've used a lot of different beard shampoo and conditioners in the past and this is just down right a terrible product. The beard shampoo i received smells like chemicals and the conditioner dried out my beard and my skin and it also made my beard itch. I've had a beard for years and i have never had my beard itch ever; not when i shave not when im wolfing never. Save your money and dont buy this b.s.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: I fell in love with this product.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this product deserves more than 5 stars. I have tried different products and haven’t been fully satisfied. I randomly came across this on Amazon while browsing similar products and I couldn’t be happier with my purchase. Smells amazing, leaves a nice feel to my beard, and most importantly it even seems to have made the irritated skin under my beard smooth, painless, and back to normal. This company knows their chemistry and how to make an amazing product. I have already recommended this product to all of my bearded friends and family. <3
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Will re-purchase
customer_reviews.text: My worse half is a man of few words which is how I'd like to keep it at the moment so this review is based only on my knowledge (the beardless better half). I opened the package because He cant manage. It was packaged nicely and very clean. No leaking. Smells great upon opening and from what I remember the smell lasts but faintly in his beard. I havent been to close to above mentioned worse half's face in 3 days. Does make his beard softer to the touch, less head protective gear possibly? Anywho stuff is great. I love a man with a beard so I guess the divorce papers can wait
customer_reviews.author: Megan Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Made in China! I'm out
customer_reviews.text: A beard product company and its products made in china is one of the worst combos I can think of. I'm throwing mine in the trash and finding a diff company to give my money to and I dont care if I spend $2 more. I'd WAY rather pay a little more for something made in a decent country, especially now with all the atrocities China is engaged in. Please consider sourcing and making your products in a better country.
customer_reviews.author: Tom F.

customer_reviews.title: Best scent! Best price! Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: First off a lot of bested products I’ve tried have an weird odor/scent that gets really old super quickly. This product beard and wash shampoo/conditioner has an amazing scent. Plus the peppermint oil in it leaves a clean and relaxing feeling. The wash does a great job keeping your face and beard feeling clean and refreshed while the conditioner does a great job leaving your beard soft and moisturized. I would 10/10 recommend this product or at least give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Kouki Chrisp

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, but left my beard feeling dry
customer_reviews.text: I've got a pretty strict beard regimen, to keep it from going completely wild. I have been looking for a new beard wash and conditioner to replace my old brand that doesn't leave my beard feeling clean. This certainly smelled good - I love peppermint, especially in the morning - and it absolutely left it feeling clean. The problem is that after, my beard felt stiff and bristly. Even applying balm and oil couldn't tame it. I think the shampoo is great, but I switched to a different conditioner and it's working much better. Looking at the ingredients, there is alcohol in this conditioner and not in others I have tried - that may be the cause. I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lee

customer_reviews.title: Viking Revolution has become my go to beard wash
customer_reviews.text: I've used a lot of beard wash products over the years. Most of them only got one purchases because they didn't make much difference or even worse they dried my beard out. Viking Revolution changed all that though. I've become a repeat customs because their product keeps my beard looking healthy and feeling soft. Congrats to them for earning my business by making a great product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Bush

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband who experienced beard rash like clock work every few weeks. Prior military so never had a beard till the past few years. Didn't really know it needed special care. Now he knows and is a loyal fan of the product. I purchased the shampoo, conditioner and the complementing oil. He's been using it for a month now and said he FINALLY has relief and it's the best thing since sliced bread. No itchiness. No redness. No flakes. No pain. Happy life, happy wife :)
customer_reviews.author: LTLRowell

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use unless you want your beard damaged
customer_reviews.text: I was optimistic with all the positive reviews but now I’m wondering if they were bought. Since using this product my beard has been very frizzy and dried out. Even with the use of beard oil or a leave in conditioner it can’t undo the damage. The scent is very over powering at first but fades quickly, by the time you finish rinsing you can no longer smell it. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Bottles Impossible to Squeeze
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the product....when I can get it out of the bottle. I saw some reviews that it was hard to squeeze but figured I'd take the chance, since I've purchased stuff from them before. I am disabled and I have no ability to get the shampoo or conditioner out unless I push my entire body against the bottle, it's like squeezing a brick. When I am able to get it out, it smells absolutely wonderful and I love the product but the bottle is badly designed.
customer_reviews.author: Shonna

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I was definitely one of those hard nosed skeptics that didn’t need any “special “ beard care products ... just called it good with a basic anti dandruff shampoo/conditioner. Decided to try this product as I’ve been getting a lot of fairy knots in my scraggly/ curly beard and have been unable to tame I’m pleased with the results I’ve gotten from Viking shampoo and conditioner. My beard is softer , smells great and no more fairy knots. The gal is pleased too :) overall product presentation is fantastic and is matched by the quality of the product and the results. Will definitely buy again and become a future representative for this company if my beard is worthy hahaha
customer_reviews.author: Timbo Slice

customer_reviews.title: Part of my everyday routine
customer_reviews.text: I will start this with i am loving these products so far. I have used them for about a week now and my fiance and i have noticed a difference in both the feel and look of my beard since the first day. The shampoo and conditioner have a fresh peppermint scent that is not too overwhelming. I very highly recommend these products to anyone interested. I will probably go for the bigger bottles next time as these ones are a little small but I got them in order to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Best wash/conditioner I have tried!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on Saturday and received it Sunday. Wash and conditioner were inside a Viking Revolution box that was sealed, great packaging. Also, before receiving product, I received a thank you email from VR. Tried both products and I am very satisfied. I have tried many beard washes that I have purchased from Amazon and so far Viking Revolution has been my favorite so far. Smells great and left my beard very soft. No shedding and no tangles. I could easily run a comb after drying without it getting stuck or pulling on hairs. Happy with product after first use. Will buy balms and oils from Viking Revolution for sure in the future!
customer_reviews.author: TxTeal

customer_reviews.title: Could be a lot better
customer_reviews.text: The actual shampoo/conditioner isn't bad. It's not great, but it's not bad - for the price I'd have given it 4 stars. What ruins it are the bottles it comes in. As plenty of other reviewers have commented, they're ridiculously difficult to squeeze, so you end up having to take the cap off and just pour some into your hand. This is the kind of thing that seems like no big deal until you're doing it in the shower with wet hands and ending up with 3x-4x the amount you actually needed. There are just too many better products out there to buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Rock hard bottles that you can’t squeeze!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! My second order came in this week. What is up with the new bottles?!?!? I can’t squeeze it to get the product out in both the shampoo and conditioner. Why??? Why the change? I have to take the lid off to pour it in my hand. This was not the case with my first order. Still love the product, but these bottles will be the reason I will not order again if something is not done about it.
customer_reviews.author: John D Ratliff

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: If you have a thick and coarse beard, this product is clearly not meant for you, the lather and thickness of the shampoo is horrible, the scent and the washing function of it are very good, but it does nothing to soften your beard or make it less tangly. The conditioner is absolutely worthless. Maybe it’s the nature of my beard, but this product is very disappointing, and I’ll never buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Basel88

customer_reviews.title: Works well but smells like Pine-Sol
customer_reviews.text: I would’ve given this product five stars because it really did the job cleaning and conditioning the beard. I gave it three stars instead because the smell is strongly reminiscent of Pine-Sol bathroom cleaner. The good news is that the conditioner does for the most part wash out and so will not conflict with the fragrance of Viking Revelition beard oil or any cologne you might want to apply to your face. Unless the fragrance changes I won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Docrlm

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! Really smells nice, and leaves the beard feel silky smooth. I have had a beard now for over 10 years, and this product is a game changer! The only thing that is a bummer is the bottles these ship in. They are hard, and can't be squeezed. This is very disappointing. However, if you take off the cap and tap it agaisnt your hand it will come out. If they fix the bottles so they can be squeezed, this will be an automatic 5 star buy. It is still a buy, but just be aware you'll have to put your muscle into getting the lotion out.
customer_reviews.author: Djsmee

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about this product is the price. it's not a top of the line wash and conditioner but it gets the job done. It's great if you want to keep things natural and they even provide a free PDF with recipes to make your own beard products. That's a company that believes in what they sell. The worst thing about this product is the scent. It's not a bad smell but it's very strong and reminds me of cough syrup. But it's not terrible. There are other conditioners that will make your hair softer, but for the price this really does a good job. A great starting point for beard care.
customer_reviews.author: PapaBeard2020

customer_reviews.title: Such a manly product!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought the beard kit for my Husband for a little Christmas present alongside with the beard wash and conditioner here! I gave the beard kit 5 stars and will be giving these two a 5 star as well!! It has changed my Husband’s beard tremendously and let me tell ya what, I am in looovveee, as is he and he is very picky on his products! It smells amazing and has made his beard crazy soft!! Seriously stop reading these comments and just buy it already because you will be amazed!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I Love this stuff the first time I tried it. I would use shampoo to wash my beard but it never felt right . First time I tried this beard wash it lathered up my beard much easier, just felt so much softer and better than using regular shampoo. I can't really explain it but it just felt different. After the beard wash and conditioner, my beard really felt softer. I could really tell the difference. And it's a good size bottle. I plan on ordering this item on a regular basis. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Jauregui

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Very Bad Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel and gentle cleaning of the shampoo; The conditioner really does soften your beard as advertised. HOWEVER, it is almost impossible to squeeze the product out of the ridged hard plastic bottles. If the bottles were a little (just a little) easier to squeeze I would have given this product "5" stars.
customer_reviews.author: Brother William

customer_reviews.title: Super nice beard shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for about half a year now, just bought more actually. Has a nice smell and you can actually feel the difference after using it for a week or two. I also use it for my head, leaves my mane feeling and looking great. You dont really need alot to get the job done. i had a decent sized beard and still only used about a nickels worth of each. Great stuff, lasts decently long, will continue to buy until my hair falls out.
customer_reviews.author: justin sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great scent and quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Father’s Day gift for my significant other and he really likes it. He says it makes his beard feel really soft and we both love the scent. The scent isn’t too strong or overpowering. He uses it everyday and told me he would get it again when it runs out. The packaging was very nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sizzle

customer_reviews.title: Great product but needs better bottles
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and bought this for my fiance and he loves the stuff. I'm on here right now buying more for him actually. His only thing was that the bottles are too hard and you can't squeeze them to get the beard wash and conditioner out. He has to unscrew the lids every time and get it out that way. So they need to improve their bottles greatly, other than that no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love Hate product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product based of amazons best seller review. I love the Beard wash and the conditioner. I have very sensitive skin, other products leave my skin feeling dry. This product works great and has a slight pleasant scent. I also like that they leave my skin and beard feeling clean after and my skin cool. Having said that I hate the bottles that the product come in. Only a tiny amount comes out and I end up having to take to top off to get the product out. Its frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: All around amazing product, from an amazing company!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Bought it for fathers day as a gift for the husband. It arrived 3 days early and the company checked in several times to make sure it arrived on time. Great customer service. The first day the hubby used it his beard was softer and felt completely different. He had been dealing with dandruff of the chin/beard for ages. This cleared it up overnight. Also, read the ingredient list! Lots of essential oils, nothing synthetic or harmful in the list at all. Smells amazing, wonderful leather. I have actually used it on my hair once or twice. I can't say enough about how wonderful this product is! Will deffinately be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works & Smells Great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this beard wash set! We just bought it for the second time. I’m allergic to coconut so it is difficult these days to find a product without coconut oil in it. That is how we happened upon this product. We are so glad we did. The scent is wonderful without being overwhelming. The quality is great; it completely rid my husband of his itchy beard dandruff!! We highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alonna Huntoon

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Im not a high maintenance person, I usually use soap to clean my whole face, including my beard. But as Im getting older and I noticed that my beard especially now becoming salt and pepper, is more difficult to maintain. So when I tried the two products- it really made a difference with my beard and the maintenance! The best part is that I don't have to do this every day, maybe 2 or 3 times during the whole week. Its worth it in the long run!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Baker

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Only have been using a little over a week now but it’s a nice product. I like having the wash and conditioner. I was previously only using a beard wash from another company. My beard isn’t that much softer but I know it takes time. I’ll update my review in a couple weeks if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Much better than all the rest out there
customer_reviews.text: I love the Viking shampoo and conditioner. I have a thicker longer beard that constantly bunches up and tangles daily especially after i sleep and it does wonders. I have tried this and then tried 2-3 others. They dont hold up to Viking. Consistency is perfect, has a nice manly scent. Unlike others it doesn't last a few hours and start to dry out. It leaves my beard soft and able to easily put a comb through even a cpl days later after sleeping. I feel it has also helped with growth. As long as i still have my beard i will keep buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Had to install 6" bench vise in shower to squeeze bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Had to install a 6" bench vise in the shower to even get the stuff out of the bottle. What kind of NASA polymer steel alloy are these "squeeze bottles" made from? Holy christ. I consider myself a fairly strong guy... the other morning while trying to squeeze this bottle, I made a noise so loud my wife woke up and thought I fell down the stairs. The dog has been hiding under the bed for 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: El Polacko

customer_reviews.title: Good Scent clean finish
customer_reviews.text: I have a beard about 4 inches long. So keeping and clean and conditioned is top priority. Of course I’m not going to be biased and say use this product only. Everyone has different needs when it comes to hair health. Experiment with different products until you find your one go to. For me, this product is awesome. It’s got the refreshing mint and eucalyptus scent. Shampoo and condition for a nice soft finish. Use a nice beard oil after drying up, balm it down and comb or brush for that dapper look. I’ve also used polished gentleman shampoo and conditioner which works just the same as Viking and at the same price.
customer_reviews.author: abu

customer_reviews.title: I Created A Monster
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a stocking stuffer for my husband. I pretty much thought he’d just roll his eyes at me and they’d sit around in our shower until I got tired of staring st them and tossed them it. WRONG. He LOVES these!! Uses them every single days and has told me repeatedly how much he enjoys them. Who knew?? LOL I’ll be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Decent product, won’t purchase again though.
customer_reviews.text: Both the shampoo and conditioner smell good, no matter which scent you purchase. However this fragrance is gone almost immediately after washing. Which isn’t much of an issue because, typically, you’re putting in oil or balm right after the shower anyway. I did not notice any softness nor healthiness between this product and any other regular shampoo-conditioner combo. All in all, not a bad product, but not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I like Viking Revolution beard oil and beard balm just fine. Their shampoo and conditioner isn't as good IMO. Excessively strong smell. The bottle composition is hard and you really can't squeeze out the product. You have to remove the cap and thump it out. As a shampoo and conditioner--it is nothing special.
customer_reviews.author: Erehwon

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to dispense
customer_reviews.text: The bottle is not designed to dispense the shampoo or conditioner. You have to unscrew the cap and get to the conditioner or shampoo out of the bottle. Like all other shampoo or conditioner bottles I have ever used the bottle is soft which allows the user to dispense product by pressing the bottle. Don’t expect easy distribution of this product from a hard nalgene like bottle. Hard to believe this bottle design was approved. Makes me really question the company and management.
customer_reviews.author: anonymously

customer_reviews.title: Great combo of beard shampoo and conditioner
customer_reviews.text: It has a minty-ish type of smell which I really like. It might feel a bit overpowering while you apply if, but the smell fades after you rinse it with water. Shampoo is really good at clean. I haven't had any issues like dry skin or anything. Conditioner does as intended and softens the beard.
customer_reviews.author: Kunal

customer_reviews.title: Give it a go. You won't be disappoint.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many beard shampoos - some I've loved & some I've hated - but this set takes the cake. I'm lazy so I'm not the biggest fan of shampooing and conditioning separately but this is totally worth the extra step. The scent is refreshing and not overbearing which is nice if you prefer to use scented oils and balms. My beard comes out soft as ever and all around feels & looks healthier. Do yourself a favor and give it a try - you won't be disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: A+ Viking Products
customer_reviews.text: Another set of great products I use from Viking. Cleans and conditions taking away the wireriness and coarseness. I use the beard balms every day. My wife notices the differences when I don't use it regularly. Give it try, great quality and value.
customer_reviews.author: Bawston Joe

customer_reviews.title: ok but not what I needed
customer_reviews.text: It is a very affordable option. The smell is kind of good, the peppermint does give a little bit of a sting to the face. My problem is since it uses water and more chemicals than I would like (less the better for the oils on the beard) it leaves my beard stiff and hard. Switched to a different product and my beard now is more soft and natural (new product used a lot less chemicals).
customer_reviews.author: jbatman

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product for Low Price
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't say it's one of the best Beard Wash & Conditioner combos... But it's okay for the price. Keep in mind the bottles are very small and dont last long. Most people hate how hard it is to squeeze it but I dont see much trouble. The odor isn't too bad and doesn't last after you rinse it off. I wouldn't say I would recommend... But wouldn't say that I wouldn't.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great product, if you can get it out.
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but find it's hard to use. The bottles are made from a very hard plastic that you're unable to squeeze which makes the caps useless. In order to use it, I need to turn it upside down and slap it against the palm of my hand and stick a finger in the hole to remove some product. All in all the shampoo and conditioner work well, but they really make you work to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom F**ckin Gill

customer_reviews.title: Eucalyptus cooling effect
customer_reviews.text: Eucalyptus! It's addictive. Your nose will open every shower and your skin will tingle. The scent does not linger, so you won't smell like a cough drop when you dry off. I live on Maui, and it makes your skin feel cool for hours even in humidity. Does a great job cleaning and conditioning, and it's at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for less expensive beard products, that was not crap. I did some research and found Viking. This is a great product, I am using less of it, and it gives me the clear clean I was looking for. I also want to puts their beard oil. It isn't heavy and it has a great light scent, but be careful, if you don't wash it off of your lips whatever you eat or drink until it is dry will taste off. :) I recommend the beard shampoo, conditioner and oil with great confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Edward C

customer_reviews.title: Great value & does what it's supposed to do at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product overall! The consistency is great and a little goes a long way. I consider my beard to be average in length and even just a small dap of this beard wash combo lathers extremely well! I'm able to make sure that every follicle of my beard is being groomed and taken care of. The rinse off is easy and there doesn't feel like there is any residue left in my skin or my beard at all. I noticed that my beard looked a lot fuller and darker after my first use which is evidence that the product does what it's intended for.
customer_reviews.author: Emosh

customer_reviews.title: Good product, poor choice on bottles.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. The shampoo and conditioner smell good, and I have less beard dander. But the bottles are worthless. They are rock hard and are not squeezable. I had to transfer them to other bottles that would work better. If they get some squeezable bottles, this would be an easy 5 out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Gus

customer_reviews.title: First impression: cannot get product out of bottle
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if this was a problem with just mine or not. The product arrived in bottles so rigid that I actually needed to use both hands to be able to squeeze it out. Now I am in my mid 30's and have become somewhat crotchety, so I had my 25 year-old brother try. He essentially stated he wouldn't use this product because it's too much work to get it out of the bottle. Perhaps this in line with the "Viking" branding, perhaps not. I will say it was a rather frustrating way to start my day today.
customer_reviews.author: Harkiran Singh

customer_reviews.title: Great beard wash/conditioner!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the wash and conditioner for my beard for over a month now. I wanted something more than just my shampoo to use on my beard. Something specifically designed for facial hair. This product didn't disappoint me. My beard is nice and soft, I'm very happy with the results!
customer_reviews.author: B. Liebowitz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! I got my product early.. this is a gift for my boyfriend. Edit: he used it this morning and loved it! 06/18/19 second order of this product. My boyfriend loves it and it's the only shampoo that gets everything out of his beard from work.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product But Bottles Suck
customer_reviews.text: The products itself are good i love the cool refreshing feeling my face has after using the beard wash and conditioner. The smell is also nice. They leave my beard feeling soft and moisturized. I recommend not using the product more than twice a week as your beard will dry out. The only issue i have is with bottles itself. I am a fairly strong guy but these bottles are ridiculously hard to squeeze out the contents so i usually just unscrew the cap and tap them on the hand and get the contents out.
customer_reviews.author: Sony Singh

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing thisbeard wash and conditioner and it's some of the best I've ever used. My beard is naturally thick and course and dries out pretty easily, but my wife has commented multiple times on how soft my beard is after using these products. I also purchased their variety pack of beard balm after trying quite a few other balms and am very impressed with its quality. The scents they come in are great as well! I'll be a loyal customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Derik Anderson

customer_reviews.title: No more beardruff!
customer_reviews.text: I have been having a growing beardruff issue for several months. I was using a bar soap for beards, and beard oil. Switching from the bar soap to this liquid shampoo and conditioner eliminated my beardruff after just a couple days. I still oil and started using the shampoo and conditioner on my hair as well to save time. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Superb duo for soft moisturized beard.
customer_reviews.text: An amazing product these are! I love the scent for the beard wash and a little goes a long way so there is also so much value you get for the price. The conditioner is amazing too, leaves your beard nice and soft and makes it smell good too. I had really itchy beard but the problem is no longer there since I started using these. Please note that I also use their beard oil. Granted the beard length too plays it's part in the itchiness but you can definitely feel a softer and moisturized beard and skin. Would definitely recommend to try it out!
customer_reviews.author: Harry_P

customer_reviews.title: great product and awesome company to work with
customer_reviews.text: in this day and age it is truly wonderful to work with a company as yours who are so caring about their customers. be assured of my continued business and support . thanks for such a great product also. clay
customer_reviews.author: clay rein

customer_reviews.title: Good scent for good beard
customer_reviews.text: Got this on a recommendation from a friend with a beard for my boyfriend who also has a beard. He loved it and it caused me to purchase more products by Viking revolution. The smell is subtle and doesn’t overpower his beard which is nice for me. It also made his beard look more full but I’m not sure if it’s due to the product or not. It definitely didn’t hurt the way it looks though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT GREAT / PACKAGE STUPID
customer_reviews.text: Basically, i loved the look, smell and feel of the bottles were too hard to use properly, you need to be a body builder or a professional arm wrestler to squeeze them! NOT RECOMMENED!
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Semorile

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get the shampoo/conditioner out
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo and conditioner quality is good and I really like the scent. However, getting the stuff out of the bottle is a pain. There is no pump mechanism and the bottles are to hard to press. This is worse for the conditioner because it’s thicker than the shampoo. Overall, not happy and will not buy again unless the my change the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: azShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Combo for Beard Health
customer_reviews.text: I had not started growing a beard until last year. Most people do not realize that a beard needs as much maintenance as a head of hair does. This beard shampoo/ conditioner combo is great! It leaves my beard feeling and smelling great. I noticed a reduction in skin irritation I was having prior to washing my beard with these products after three days of use.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Can't get it out of the bottle
customer_reviews.text: I truly like what this product does for my beard - after I can get it out of the bottle. The plastic is so stiff/thick that I cant' squeeze the bottle. Now I'm a former athlete and weightlifter so I don't think my strength is the problem although I admit I'm getting older.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Annoying bottles
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like the smell at all it was way too overpowering. And the bottles are way too stiff. I can barely dent the bottles when I squeeze it so to get anything out(especially conditioner) you have to turn it upside down and hit it on your palm. It wasn’t a big deal just annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very minty
customer_reviews.text: So my boyfriend says the mint in this is very overwhelming. His beard is about chest length and a good density. The product does soften the beard, I can attest to that, but he hates using it for the most part because of the mint. So now it gets used like once a month. If you have sensitive skin or what have you, it may not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Belle Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great! Itching has stopped and facial hair is soft as ever
customer_reviews.text: I started using this for about a week, it has really made a difference for me and my crappy facial hair. My face is no longer itchy during the day and my girlfriend told me it has never been softer. I really like the cooling effect when I use the Conditioner and it leaves my face feeling fresh when getting out of the shower. 5/5 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Field

customer_reviews.title: Beard wash is a must and Viking Revolution nailed it!
customer_reviews.text: This beard wash is like a cleansing pepermint massage. Absolutely love this product. I only use it twice a week at the moment but I get excited every time I use it. Makes my beard feel soft and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Drake

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: I had ridiculous beard dandruff. It got to the point I could wear a dark shirt. I didn't want to shave because my beard covers a scar on my face. I tried dandruff shampoos and used conditioner but it got worse. Day one with this beard shampoo and conditioner the dandruff was gone! The smell is nice too and it feels invigorating. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hora

customer_reviews.title: Works great, smells great
customer_reviews.text: This is the first beard wash/conditioner I have tried and I am pleased. The aroma when washing is a great scent first thing in the morning. The more I have used this the softer my beard has gotten. Absolutely no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Best product out of dozens tried
customer_reviews.text: Tried several shampoo and conditioner products, and this is the best of all of them. Good foam upon application, super smooth and tangle free after shower. Great neutral masculine scent.
customer_reviews.author: JonnyB

customer_reviews.title: Beard Shampoo and conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I was unaware that such products even existed however after using them I have noticed and felt a significant difference in my beard. It shines more and is easier to manage on top of all that they smell good and feel good. They're so easy to use I just threw them into my shower routine and wash and condition as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Product is great, containers need some reworking.
customer_reviews.text: Bottle is impossible to squeeze. Quality control should have picked up on this oversight long before it ever was made for the masses. That being said, the product contained within the bottles...is great. The smell is quite potent, but not of the chemical variety like others have mentioned. It's a strong eucalyptus and peppermint, as advertised, and smells pleasant to me and quite invigorating! This stuff works.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wash and conditioner!
customer_reviews.text: Great ingredients and great price. Works well at washing and conditioning/softening a beard. My only complaint would the bottles are very hard to squeeze product out of and I mean really hard. But wouldn’t stop me from buying again. Great company with great products. Have the beard oil and charcoal soap as well. Great stuff all around!
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME FOREVER A CUSTOMER!!!
customer_reviews.text: First off, business checked in with me when I first bought it and helped me out with a delivery issue I had and went above and beyond to help me which I appreciate. Received product and gave to my boyfriend as gift. He loves and enjoys both wash and conditioner. I dye his beard so he says it helps soften the hair and protects his skin since it’s pretty sensitive. Must buy !
customer_reviews.author: shirleyyysue

customer_reviews.title: Good product, horrendous packaging
customer_reviews.text: BLUF: This would be a 5-star review, but their packaging is just that bad. The shampoo and conditioner are great; noticeable difference in my beard's texture within a few washes. But the packaging is such a PITA, I'm not sure I'd ever get this product again. The bottles are very stiff, and both the conditioner and shampoo are viscous enough that getting them out of the bottles is near impossible, especially first thing in the morning. I end up taking off the caps and banging them on my hands to get some out. Change up your packaging, please!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good co-wash
customer_reviews.text: This is a good co-wash combination in two bottles, which I really like. I prefer two bottles because I can control the amounts according to my needs. The scent is perfect for both. Rub a small amount of shampoo in your hands to begin a suds then apply to beard. It feels great. Then rinse and apply the conditioner. Man it feels good as you feel it start to tingle and cool the skin. Leaves the beard in perfect "condition." Get 'em both. Won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jp

customer_reviews.title: Great combination to use. Stops itch and dry skin under your beard quickly!!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the best beard shampoo and conditioner combination that I've used to date. I've had a beard for many years now and have tried a lot of different products and this one is top notch. Use them both for best results. My beard feels so soft and manageable afterwards and the smell is decent too. Prior to using this I had a spot on my chin where it was dry and flaky and itchy. Within days this helped tremendously and within a week it was gone. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Valli

customer_reviews.title: Works great but...
customer_reviews.text: You need the strength to collapse a star into a black hole if you want to squeeze shampoo and conditioner out of these bottles. They're incredibly stiff and I had to resort to opening the bottles to get the stuff out. The smell is good and they get the job done, but they wont be getting any more of my business if I have to break my hands every time I take a shower.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel G. Muñoz

customer_reviews.title: No matter how big or small the beard this stuff does magic
customer_reviews.text: I still have a patchy baby beard but this stuff helps soften it up and it make it smell amazing. I use the beard wash once a week so I don't dry it out. I use the conditioner every other day & the difference is crazy
customer_reviews.author: storm

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like it
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, it's just OK. I've enjoyed other beard washes and conditioners much more. the scent is VERY subtle and the conditioner id pretty mediocre IMO. No where near as soft as other conditioners have left my beard.
customer_reviews.author: flyingwallrus

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well.
customer_reviews.text: Good natural cleaning soap. Wish the scent was a little stronger, but it does clean and condition well. It doesn't take make, but wish it was a little cheaper. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Been suffering from beard dandruff for quite some time now. Head and shoulders worked for a little bit then stopped. Beard oil and balms alone did nothing. Started using this daily along with the Viking brush and have done away with the dandruff. The wife also enjoys how soft my beard has been also.
customer_reviews.author: bobby d

customer_reviews.title: Best wash ever
customer_reviews.text: 5 STARS ACROSS THE BOARD!!💥 I purchased this for my husband who is the very proud owner of a full beard! First time he used it you could see a difference from his normal beard wash, his beard is now shinier, softer, straighter and smells amazing! He informed me after the first use that he will only be using these products and is excited to check out other products from this company!!!
customer_reviews.author: Butler14

customer_reviews.title: Shampoo is great. Conditioner lacking
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shampoo. Smells good and very little is needed for good lather. Conditioner has not made my goatee any softer or more manageable. Still wiry 😐 Only recommend the shampoo
customer_reviews.author: SizeKingTx

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and really tames the mane!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of only a handful of beard wash and conditioners that I have tried but I am liking the results so far from Viking Revolution better than the others that I have tried and the scent of the peppermint afterwards is a nice subtle fragrance that remains throughout most of the day since I've started using it. Definitely recommend this stuff for anyone with a thick bristly beard that you want to try and tame!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Favourite

customer_reviews.title: Better than the other two products I  tried...
customer_reviews.text: Small bottles. But I find it only takes a small amount to get the job done. The conditioner does leave the hair soft. Smells nice. This is better than the other two products I tried. I won't mention those names. Thanks. R
customer_reviews.author: RCLloyd

customer_reviews.title: Refreshed beard
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a product to help me with my neglected beard. The shampoo and conditioner made a huge difference even after the first use. texture wise you can feel the softness in my beard. You can feel it working as you message it into your beard. It has a nice mint feel/smell that is not overbearing and it does not linger around long.
customer_reviews.author: Batrao

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say Viking Beard wash and Conditioner makes my beard really really soft and smelling good and it takes away that itch..... I prefer it over other known brands!
customer_reviews.author: Michael W

customer_reviews.title: The best product
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a pretty glorious beard but it has always felt a bit wirey. He’s tried several different beard oils but none have helped much. After reading the reviews for this product, I decided to order it for him. After using it twice there was a noticeable difference. He loves the smell too! We will definitely be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Ezell

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell...terrible bottle materials used!
customer_reviews.text: This beard wash and conditioner does the job of washing and conditioning my beard. However...and it's a big however....the bottles are made out of gorilla-strength plastic, making it near-impossible to squeeze anything out of the bottle with the cap on. Imagine trying to squeeze a bottle of ketchup...in 1985...you know...the GLASS ones. I can only find three remedies to this situation: 1) return the product 2) pour the product into another container 3) take the top off and tap on the Heinz label on the neck...well take the top off and hope too much doesn't come out when I tap it on my palms. Product works, but the bottle material is absolutely terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Woolbie

customer_reviews.title: Splendid Beardcare!
customer_reviews.text: You know I love the peppermint scent so are these. Smells really good! No more itchiness. Thank you very much for the fast paced delivery and it's quality.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Hubby's favorite brand
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband after he tried the small kit during the whole quarantine slash lockdown. He was letting his beard grow but it was unruly and wiry, it scraped the crap out of my face. But since using this product, my husband found his favorite go to products for unbelievable smooth hair. He loves that the scents aren't overwhelming and that it's not harsh on his sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Hill

product_meta.title: Viking Revolution Beard Wash & Beard Conditioner Set w/Argan & Jojoba Oils – Softens, Smooths & Strengthens Beard Growth - Natural Peppermint and Eucalyptus Scent - Beard Shampoo w/Beard Oil (5 oz)

CONTAINS NATURAL BEARD OIL: This beard maintenance set is made with our top Beard Oil to give you the deepest moisturization and best beard growth conditioner possible.
MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: We are so confident that you will love this Beard Wash and Conditioner Kit, if for any reason you are not completely satisfied, we will refund your money!
